alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 4:49PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN MARION...CENTRAL PUTNAM AND CENTRAL CLAY COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 448 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from Middleburg to near Hollister to near Orange Springs. Storms are about to collide with the Atlantic sea breeze which could intensify them. Movement was northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Green Cove Springs, Interlachen, East Palatka, Middleburg, Fleming Island, George`s Lake, Florahome, Bostwick, and Doctors Inlet. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam
